name: Ariane's Assistant
description:
The game is based on the Ariane Eldar comics (Theater Of The Bloody Tongue a.o.) about a sexy witch that works as burlesque theater star in post-modern times. She's a fan of classic rock, too. You play a fan who wants to hire as her assistant in the theater. The game contains elements of dating game and quiz.

Warning:  contains some nudity and naughty themes. NSFW.
